{"model":"gpt-4o","max_output_tokens":128,"temperature":0.0,"stream":true,"input":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Where am I located?
"}],"type":"message"}],"instructions":"
            You are integrated into a test platform. It is very important that you answer 
            succinctly and always provide the text in the requested format without any additional 
            text. 
          ","tools":[{"type":"function","name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country."}]}
